edu.vt.middleware.ldap.pool
Class DefaultLdapFactory

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.middleware.ldap.pool.AbstractLdapFactory<Ldap>
      edu.vt.middleware.ldap.pool.DefaultLdapFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
LdapFactory<Ldap>
public class DefaultLdapFactory
extends AbstractLdapFactory<Ldap>

DefaultLdapFactory provides a simple implementation of a ldap factory. Uses ConnectLdapValidator by default.

Version:
$Revision: 183 $ $Date: 2009-05-05 22:45:57 -0400 (Tue, 05 May 2009) $
Author:
Middleware Services

DefaultLdapFactory

public DefaultLdapFactory()
This creates a new DefaultLdapFactory with the default properties file, which must be located in your classpath.

DefaultLdapFactory

public DefaultLdapFactory(java.lang.String propertiesFile)
This creates a new DefaultLdapFactory with the supplied properties file, which must be located in your classpath.

Parameters:
propertiesFile - String

DefaultLdapFactory

public DefaultLdapFactory(LdapConfig lc)
This creates a new DefaultLdapFactory with the supplied ldap configuration. The ldap configuration will be marked as immutable by this factory.

Parameters:
lc - ldap config
Method Detail

getConnectOnCreate

public boolean getConnectOnCreate()
Returns whether ldap objects will attempt to connect after creation. Default is true.

Returns:
boolean

setConnectOnCreate

public void setConnectOnCreate(boolean b)
This sets whether newly created ldap objects will attempt to connect. Default is true.

Parameters:
b - connect on create
